alert.note: Alert for Meade (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 19 at 4:01PM EDT until May 19 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT/345 PM CDT/ FOR SOUTHEASTERN CRAWFORD...NORTHEASTERN PERRY AND NORTHWESTERN MEADE COUNTIES... At 401 PM EDT/301 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Carefree Town, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Carefree Town, Mount Pleasant, Leopold, Leavenworth, Alton, Roberta, Oriole, Fredonia, Beechwood and Magnet. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
